description: The French president moves swiftly to replace Edouard Philippe with a mayor from the south.
title: France's Macron picks Jean Castex as PM after Philippe resigns
title_page: France's Macron picks Jean Castex as PM after Philippe resigns - BBC News
maintext: Edouard Philippe was a good fit for Mr Macron during this crisis: a technocrat from the centre right who was seen as a steady pair of hands during the coronavirus epidemic, but he had started to outshine the president - a dangerous place to be at any time, let alone a time that calls for change.
